story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: In the flesh! You're the neew intern, right? I think I've seen you around a bit. What are you doing-

story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: What happened to my garden? The hydroponics! It's all ruined!

story.name: You
story.text: Well we had a bit of a flood... and I had to deal with a rather aggressive school of fish.

story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: Aggressive? Pfft, fish who live in schools tends to be rather meek.

choices: I'm telling the truth! It all happened when I opened the airlock...
Yeah... I do study animal biology you know.

responses.name: You
responses.text: The second I enterred the room, all the fish began to swarm.

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: They don't usually do that...

responses.name: You
responses.text: Well these ones did. They swam around me, blocking my vision and tripping me up. It was almost like they were geetting into some kind of formation.

responses.name: You
responses.text: I'm no athlete, but I could've won a medal with how fast I made it to that release valve.

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: I know, I just-

responses.name: You
responses.text: Look, I'm not here to argue, I'm just telling you what happened.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Riley overrode the door and I opened it with my keycard.

responses.name: You
responses.text: I went to make my way to the release valve to get the water out.

responses.name: You
responses.text: But a school of fish was caught in the room. As if under orders, they started attacking me!

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: That's weird.

responses.name: You
responses.text: You don't say. I more or less had to fight my way through a cloud of fins and gills!

story.name: You
story.text: Anyway, fish aside, you think you can get this place up and running?

story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: Of course I can! It'll just be a hassle is all.

story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: I'll have to let the soil dry out and clean all the tanks. Then I'll have to replant everything. Ugh, so much work!

story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: Once I get this place back up and running though, I can provide food for the whole base.

story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: Good thing you woke me up, this is gonna take forever.

story.name: Fuzzy
story.text: Anything I can help you with since you woke me up?

choices: Do you happen to know why the base flooded?

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: Can't say I'm too sure on that one. I was just cleaning the fish tanks when the alarms went off.

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: You know, now that you say something about that school of fish... the ones in the tanks...

responses.name: You
responses.text: What about them?

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: Nah, I'm just being paranoid is all.

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: Hey, why stand here and chat with me? You've got nine more rooms to open up! Don't let me keep you.

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: The kitchen is nextdoor, so you should go open that one up. I only grow food, not cook it.

responses.name: You
responses.text: But about your fish-

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: Don't let me keep you.

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: Nextdoor? Oh that'll be the kitchen. You'll be able to find Darryl there, he's our chef.

responses.name: You
responses.text: Orange hair and likes music, right?

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: That's the one, though he likes classical stuff. Not enough synth for me, personally.

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: Anyway, he's the one who cooks the food I grow and the fish I keep...

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: The fish...

responses.name: You
responses.text: What about them?

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: Ah, nothing! You should go ahead on over to the kitchen.

responses.name: You
responses.text: But it might be important?

responses.name: Fuzzy
responses.text: It's not. Don't let me stand in your way.
